articles.title: 2025 Predictions
articles.author: James Corbett
articles.summary: OpenAI is partnering with Anduril to create new AI weapons systems. Additionally, xAI has launched its "Colossus" data center, featuring 100,000 GPUs and planning to upgrade to 1,000,000 GPUs with a power draw of 1.5 gigawatts.

articles.title: 7NEWS Tech Editor Shaun White discovers the 10 coolest gadgets at CES 2025
articles.author: Shaun White
articles.summary: Roborock introduced the Saros Z70, a robot vacuum and mop hybrid with a folding arm. Samsung showcased an AI mirror that analyzes skin and recommends products. Furthermore, Honda presented the 0 Saloon, an EV with Level 3 automated driving. These were among several new products and concepts displayed at CES 2025.

articles.title: Lidl middle aisle must-have for beauty fans as major hair tool dupe set to land – and it's less than €20
articles.author: Jodie McCormack
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a new Hair Drying Brush, a dupe for the Revlon One Step Volumiser, in stores from January 20 to 22. The Lidl brush, priced at €19.99, offers a dual function of blow-drying and styling hair simultaneously, featuring two heat settings, a cold air function, and "Ion function for optimal styling results".

articles.title: Samsung releases your video invitation to the first Galaxy Unpacked event for 2025
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil its next-generation flagship lineup, the Galaxy S25 series (S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra), at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22nd. The Galaxy S25 Ultra features a design overhaul with rounded edges and an upgraded 50MP ultrawide camera, potentially with Qi2 wireless charging. The event may also feature the Galaxy Ring 2 with enhanced sensors and battery life, and AR glasses integrating Google's Gemini AI.

articles.title: Adult video actresses faces competition from AI-generated 'perfect beauty'
articles.author: Michael Hoffman
articles.summary: The Shukan Post highlights the potential impact of AI on the AV industry. AI is generating 'perfect beauty' which creates new competition for aspiring actresses. This new technology is unbound by biology and physics which brings new capabilities to AV industry.

articles.title: How Jack Got His iShine Car Wash Membership Online Effortlessly
articles.author: i Shine Car Wash
articles.summary: iShine Car Wash introduced an online membership service. This membership offers customers unlimited car washes with a simple online sign-up process, eliminating the need for appointments or waiting in line.

articles.title: Nvidia Just Solved A Huge Steam Deck Problem. What Happens Next?
articles.author: Jason Evangelho
articles.summary: Nvidia is developing a native GeForce NOW app for the Steam Deck, scheduled to ship later this year. This app will allow users to play games purchased on platforms like Steam without needing workarounds, opening the door to enjoying games that won't run on the handheld.

articles.title: This Smart Home Pod Promises Powerful New Tricks to Stop Porch Pirates
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: Hyve, a startup, launched its delivery lockbox at CES 2025, targeting package theft. The lockbox features smart tech and an innovative design to provide a robust solution against porch pirates. It includes features like a carbon fiber tether for enhanced security.

articles.title: PikaShow APK Download Latest Version V86 For Android 2025 App
articles.summary: GB WhatsApp, a modified version of WhatsApp, provides enhanced functionality and greater customization. It allows users features like hiding online status and using dual accounts.

articles.title: This viral 'phone toaster' at CES can fully charge your handset in under 5 seconds
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: At CES 2025, Swippitt unveiled a battery-swapping service for smartphones. The service involves a Hub and a Link (phone case) that contains a battery. Users can insert their phone in the Hub to have the depleted battery swapped for a fully charged 3,500 mAh battery.

articles.title: Taycan forward
articles.author: Kap Maceda
articles.summary: Porsche launched an upgraded Taycan model in 2019 and introduced it in the Philippines by the end of 2020. The new Taycan features a bigger battery, a new rear motor, and aerodynamic improvements, resulting in a 35% increase in range, sprightlier acceleration, and shorter battery charging times. The Turbo S variant boasts 952hp and can accelerate from 0-100kph in 2.4 seconds, while the rear-wheel-drive version achieves it in 4.8 seconds, with overall enhancements to user interface, displays, and mobile device integration.

articles.title: Nescafé to launch first-ever espresso concentrate to U.S. market
articles.author: Emily Caldwell
articles.summary: Nescafé is launching its first-ever espresso concentrate in the U.S. market, following successful launches in China and Australia. The Nescafé Espresso Concentrate, made with 100% Arabica beans, will be available in Black and Sweet Vanilla flavors, targeting younger generations' demand for cold coffee, and aims to provide a convenient and customizable at-home barista-style experience.

articles.title: The next generation: Yale launches the Linus L2 smart lock
articles.summary: Yale has launched the Linus™ L2 smart lock in Israel, featuring diverse opening options like fingerprint, keypad, app, or proximity reader. The lock includes remote control and access management via the Yale Home app, a removable rechargeable battery, Sabbath mode compatibility, and smart system integration. It's available in silver and black, with a base package priced at NIS 1,100.

articles.title: Swippit Phone Battery Changer at CES 2025: Instant Battery Swap in 2 Seconds
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Swippitt, a tech company, introduced the Swippit battery hub at CES 2025, a device that swaps a smartphone's depleted battery for a fully charged one in seconds using a custom phone case called the Link. The Swippit Hub is priced at $450, with each battery case costing $120, and users can monitor battery percentages via a companion app.

articles.title: Wayfair and Google Cloud Announce Expanded Partnership to Transform Online Retail with Gemini
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Wayfair is leveraging Google's Gemini models and Google Workspace to enhance its product catalog and customer experience. This initiative aims to unlock the next generation of retail experiences for Wayfair customers.

articles.title: Syndigo Unveils Product Experience Cloud for Retail at NRF 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syndigo launched its Product Experience Cloud for Retail at the NRF Retail's Big Show in New York. The Product Experience Cloud for Retail is available for demonstration at Syndigo's Booth #4064 during NRF 2025.

articles.title: Why Amazon wants to discontinue 'Try Before You Buy' service
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its 'Try Before You Buy' service. The company cites limited scalability and customer preference for new AI-powered features, such as virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations, as the reason for this decision.

articles.title: Amazon reduces cordless vacuum 'like a mini Dyson' to £40 and shoppers 'can't fault it'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of its best-selling handheld vacuum cleaner. Customers describe it as lightweight, powerful, and having good suction, comparing it favorably to a mini Dyson. While effective for hard floors and small jobs, some users note limitations with pet hair removal.

articles.title: Woman transforms grimy grout to 'gleaming white' using affordable duo
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: HG Grout Cleaner, available at Morrisons, is used for initial grout cleaning. UniBond grout reviver, available on Amazon, restores grout to a pristine white finish and is praised for its ease of application and effective results.

articles.title: PM Modi visits exhibition at Viksit Bharat Young Leaders Dialogue
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Several programs are being introduced in diverse areas. Metla Sudha Sekhar is offering programs like "Java Programming with ChatGPT" and "A Comprehensive ASP.NET Core MVC 6 Project Guide for 2024". Inara Marketers is offering "Performance Marketing for eCommerce Brands" and elearnmarkets is offering "A2Z Of Money".

articles.title: Ajax transfer news: Steven Berghuis will extend with Ajax
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: SEOPress, a WordPress SEO plugin, offers comprehensive features to optimize SEO, boost traffic, and improve social sharing. Ajax is extending the contract of Steven Berghuis for two years, securing his future with the club.

articles.title: Affordable Essentials open gift shop on Brent Lane in Pensacola l PHOTOS
articles.summary: Affordable Essentials has launched a new gift and novelty store on Brent Lane. The store offers customers various gifts and novelty items for shoppers of all ages.

articles.title: I Switched to New Outlook for Windows so You Didn't Have To
articles.author: Patrick Campanale
articles.summary: Microsoft launched New Outlook earlier this year as an email client. The new client sends and receives emails and can handle multiple email accounts with customizable signatures. However, the client includes ads that require a paid subscription (Microsoft 365 Basic) to remove.

articles.title: This Battery-Powered 8-In-1 Electric Cleaning Brush Can Be Had For A Whopping 50% Off Today
articles.summary: Qimedo offers a battery-powered shower scrubber with accessories for $39.99 using the discount code AMZQIMEDO, a significant reduction from its original price of $80. This promotion makes the product more accessible to consumers.

articles.title: Best tumble dryers to keep your clothes crisp and fresh
articles.summary: The article introduces and reviews several new tumble dryer models from different companies. Miele TEF765WP is a premium appliance with smart home integration; Haier X Series 11 features a large capacity and AI-driven cycles; Whirlpool FFTM229X2B offers heat pump performance at a lower price; Hotpoint H2 D71 W is a reliable condenser dryer; and Samsung Series 5 OptimalDry stands out with its black design and quick drying capabilities.

articles.title: New Image opens second vehicle body repair shop in Norwich
articles.author: Adam Barker
articles.summary: New Image has expanded its services by opening a new facility on Hall Road, specializing in commercial vehicle body repairs and detailing for vans, taxis, campervans, and motorhomes. The company's original site in Garden Street will continue to serve customers, while the new Hall Road repair shop focuses on commercial vehicles.

articles.title: Best Practices For Using AI To Develop Images
articles.author: Kimberly A. Whitler
articles.summary: Getty Images has created an AI tool built solely on its permissioned, pre-shot creative library, providing indemnification and worldwide usage rights for visuals generated or modified using their AI services.  The tool ensures that users won't violate intellectual property rights because the AI is not trained on any existing IP. Getty Images offers an AI tool that ensures commercial safety for users.

articles.title: 27 Things From Nordstrom You Shouldn't Wait Until Your Birthday To Treat Yourself To
articles.author: Gabrielle Moss
articles.summary: The article features a curated list of products. Maison Margiela introduced a Replica Lazy Sunday Morning candle. Dyson is promoting the Super Sonic hair dryer, which aims to dry hair quickly without heat damage. Quip offers a rechargeable water flosser featuring an aesthetic design.

articles.title: Half-kilo weight, 1MB storage: This is world's first smartphone, its price was Rs..., was manufactured by...
articles.summary: IBM launched the IBM Simon smartphone in 1994, combining mobile communication with computing. Manufactured by Mitsubishi Electric, it featured a touchscreen, apps, and email functionalities. The device had a monochrome LCD touchscreen, integrated applications like an address book, calendar, email, and a game, and functioned as a cellular phone capable of sending and receiving faxes.

articles.title: Novitec has made the Ferrari Purosangue lower and louder
articles.summary: Novitec has launched an upgrade package for the Ferrari Purosangue, featuring forged 23-inch alloys, lowering springs, and a performance exhaust system. The exhaust system has options, including one with a flap gate for enhanced sound. Novitec is also developing an aftermarket body kit for future release.

articles.title: She was shunned for Donald Trump's inauguration 2017…but now fashion giants are begging to dress Melania on her husband's big day
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Yoast SEO plugin enhances website visibility for WordPress and Shopify. Yoast SEO Premium offers advanced features, while Yoast Academy provides courses and resources for SEO mastery. Fashion houses like Ralph Lauren, Versace, and Christian Dior are now offering to dress Melania Trump for upcoming events.

articles.title: Why Samsung's Galaxy S24 will be beaten this month by something totally new
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil its Galaxy S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra at an Unpacked event on January 22. The new devices are expected to feature an expanded Galaxy AI, Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, improved cameras, and a new "Now Bar" feature that provides contextual information based on user activity.

articles.title: New £179 Android phone hits UK shores with specs that beat the iPhone 16
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching the Redmi Note 14 series, featuring models like the Redmi Note 14, Note 14 Pro, Note 14 Pro 5G, and Note 14 Pro+ 5G, with prices ranging from £179 to £399. These smartphones offer diverse features, including high-resolution cameras, fast refresh rate displays, and varying levels of processing power, with the Note 14 Pro+ 5G featuring the new Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chipset. The Redmi Note 14 series comes with Android 14 using Xiaomi's HyperOS software skin and is available in different colors.

articles.title: From goose feather to microfibre - these are the best duvets to shop now
articles.author: Emma North
articles.summary: Soak & Sleep introduced Soft Like Down Microfibre Duvet, while Emma launched Emma Cloud Duvet, designed for comfort and temperature regulation. Dusk offers the Dusk Supreme 80% Goose Down Duvet. M&S features the Supremely Washable 10.5 Tog Duvet and Active Anti-Allergy with HeiQ Allergen Tech Duvet 13.5 Tog. Simba has launched a Hybrid 3-in-1 Duvet, consisting of two duvets which can be combined for different seasons.

articles.title: From Holograms to Robots, These Are the Coolest Things We Saw at CES 2025
articles.author: Bryn Gelbart
articles.summary: Tech companies showcased hundreds of new products, including AI-powered robots and the latest TVs and monitors, at CES 2025 in Las Vegas. These companies provided a preview of their next year's product lineups and innovative concepts.

articles.title: Zuckerberg and Musk need to answer a question: what's the point of tech?
articles.author: Andrew Griffin
articles.summary: Technology companies showcased their latest products and speculative concepts at CES, including TVs with smarts and software and new AI offerings. LG introduced 'affectionate intelligence', along with home robots and in-car entertainment systems designed to soothe stress. Samsung wants people to be interested in the smarts and software of the TVs.

articles.title: Delhi braces for intense winter chill as IMD predicts rain
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Inara Marketers is providing a Performance Marketing for eCommerce Brands course. StockEdge is providing Financial Education with their A2Z Of Money course. Accenture Technology is providing AI and Analytics based Business Strategy Course.

articles.title: Marks and Spencer shoppers rush to buy 'luxurious' spring bedding that 'doesn't need ironing'
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer launched a bedding set, priced from £39.50 to £69, available in cherry blossom print (red, pink, or grey). Customers praise the 'luxurious' design and 'game changer' easy-care features of the M&S bedding, highlighting the non-iron cotton cover and zipped closure.

articles.title: PTC Showcases New Retail PLM Updates at NRF 2025
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: PTC will showcase its latest innovations in product lifecycle management at NRF 2025, suggesting the introduction or demonstration of new product offerings.

articles.title: 'Zero stick' Ninja frying pan that's 'perfect for frying crispy bacon' has 30% off
articles.author: Ellie Gosley
articles.summary: Ninja's ZEROSTICK Classic Cookware 28cm Frying Pan is available on Amazon with a reduced price of £21. This frying pan features ZEROSTICK technology, making it durable and non-stick and suitable for all hob types, including induction. Customer reviews on Amazon have rated the pan 4.7 out of 5 stars, praising its non-stick capabilities and ease of cleaning.

articles.title: If You're Looking To Update Your Bedroom Here Are 25 Products To Start With
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: Poplight, a queer-owned small business, launched a rechargeable stick-on wall light with adjustable color temperatures and brightness via a free app. Lili n Momo Designs offers gorgeous wall decals. Gina Marie Originals based in Chattanooga, Tennessee, sells closet organizers, shirts, and drawer organizers. Krovel Furniture Co. based in Portland, Maine sells handcrafted floating furniture.

articles.title: China's AI Disruptor DeepSeek: Young Geniuses Challenge US Tech Giants with Breakthrough AI Model
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: DeepSeek launched its DeepSeek V3 large language model (LLM) on December 26. The model's performance rivals that of US counterparts, achieved with fewer resources. DeepSeek's groundbreaking V3 model is the result of collaboration between 150 researchers and engineers,alongside a specialized team of 31 data automation experts.

articles.title: People Are Ditching Pricier Mops for This Now-$49 Shark Wet-Dry Vacuum That Cuts Cleaning Time in Half
articles.author: Shea Simmons
articles.summary: Shark introduces the VacMop, a 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop designed for hard floors. This lightweight device vacuums up dry debris and then mops with a cleaning solution sprayed from an integrated canister. Users at Walmart report that the Vacmop significantly reduces cleaning time and eliminates the need for separate buckets or devices.

articles.title: Don't Throw Away Pilled Sweaters! My Mom and 96,000+ Amazon Shoppers Swear by This $11 Fabric Shaver
articles.author: Alyssa Grabinski
articles.summary: Beautural has launched the Fabric Shaver and Lint Remover, a tool designed to remove pills and lint from fabrics. The device features two speeds, a protective cover, and includes extra blades and a dust bag. The product is available on Amazon and has received positive reviews for its effectiveness on various fabrics.

articles.title: Win the new Nutribullet in this week's Fabulous competition
articles.author: Catherine Bennion-Pedley
articles.summary: Nutribullet has launched its new 900 series, available in four matte colors. The new series boasts 50% more power for nutrient extraction and includes a 900ml Colossal Cup, designed to crush ice, seeds, stems, and skins in under 60 seconds.

articles.title: Snack makers try to keep long-selling products 'fresh'
articles.author: Japan Times
articles.summary: Companies are introducing related products in an effort to connect and engage with consumers. This strategy aims to foster customer interaction and build brand loyalty through these newly available offerings.

articles.title: The 2 Big Reasons We're Dying to Test a New Robot Mower Launched at CES 2025
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: The Lymow One is an innovative robot lawnmower featuring key improvements over existing models. It is poised for testing this spring, highlighting new capabilities in lawn care technology.
